meanings: (일부러) intentionally, on purpose, deliberately, importunately, (감히) daringly, positively, (특히) especially, particularly

meanings.meaning: be too familiar to need explanation

examples.korean: ‘I don’t think I’ll bother finishing this.’ ‘Please yourself.’ 발음듣기 “내가 구태여 이걸 끝낼 것 같지는 않아.” “너 좋을 대로 해.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘I don’t think I’ll bother finishing this.’ ‘Please yourself.’ 발음

examples.korean: There is no hurry[rush]. 발음듣기 구태여 그렇게 서둘 건 없네 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
If you want, I won't stop you. 발음듣기 네가 원한다면 구태여 말리지는 않겠다 Neungyule
examples.english: If you want, I won't stop you. 발음

examples.korean: You need not bother to attend the meeting. 발음듣기 그 모임에 구태여 참석할 필요는 없다 Neungyule
examples.english: You need not bother to attend the meeting. 발음

examples.korean: Don't trouble (yourself) to attend the meeting. 발음듣기 그 모임에 구태여 참석할 필요는 없다 Neungyule
examples.english: Don't trouble (yourself) to attend the meeting. 발음
